feed.title: GitHub HCL Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of HCL in GitHub

entry.title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-s3-bucket
entry.summary: Terraform module that creates an S3 bucket with an optional IAM user for external CI/CD systems

entry.title: bridgecrewio/terragoat
entry.summary: TerraGoat is Bridgecrew's "Vulnerable by Design" Terraform repository. TerraGoat is a learning and training project that demonstrates how common configuration errors can find their way into production cloud environments.
